meanings.definition: The state or quality of being conjugate.
meanings.sent1: The conjugateness of the two words made the sentence flow smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The conjugateness of the colors in the painting created a harmonious effect.
meanings.sent3: The conjugateness of the puzzle pieces made it easy to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The conjugateness of the dancers' movements was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The conjugateness of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: The property of being joined together or linked in a series.
meanings.sent1: The conjugateness of the train cars allowed for a smooth ride.
meanings.sent2: The conjugateness of the beads on the necklace gave it a unique design.
meanings.sent3: The conjugateness of the story's plot twists kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent4: The conjugateness of the musical notes created a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The conjugateness of the numbers in the sequence made it easy to follow.
